testInfo.name: Тест по пассивному залогу английского языка
testInfo.description: Тест на Passive Voice в разных временах

questions.question: What is the passive form of: 'They build houses.'?
Choose the passive form: 'Someone stole my car.'
Change to passive: They are repairing the road.
What is the structure of Present Simple Passive?
Change to passive: They will deliver the package tomorrow.
questions.correctAnswer: The package will be delivered tomorrow.

questions.question: Choose the passive form: 'Shakespeare wrote Hamlet.'
options: Hamlet has been written by Shakespeare.
Hamlet had been written by Shakespeare.

questions.question: Change to passive: They have finished the project.
What is the passive form of: 'They are painting the house.'?
Change to passive: Someone had cleaned the room before we arrived.
questions.correctAnswer: The room had been cleaned before we arrived.

questions.question: Change to passive: They make these cars in Germany.
questions.correctAnswer: These cars are made in Germany.

questions.question: What is the structure of Past Perfect Passive?
Change to passive: They were watching the movie.
Choose the active form of: 'The book was read by many people.'
options: Many people are reading the book.
Many people have read the book.
Many people will read the book.

questions.question: Change to passive: They must complete the work by Friday.
questions.correctAnswer: The work must be completed by Friday.
